vulnerability.title: Enable Dracut FIPS Module
vulnerability.description: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 has an installation-time kernel flag that can enable FIPS mode. The installer must be booted with fips=1 for the system to have FIPS mode enabled. Enabling FIPS mode on a preexisting system is not supported. If this rule fails on an installed system, then this is a permanent finding and cannot be fixed. To enable FIPS, the system requires that the fips module is added in dracut configuration. Check if /etc/dracut.conf.d/40-fips.conf contain add_dracutmodules+=" fips "
vulnerability.recommendation: Review and remediate: Enable Dracut FIPS Module
